skill.name: report-generator
skill.description: Generate professional markdown and HTML reports from data with charts, tables, and analysis.
skill.summary: Generate professional markdown and HTML reports from data with charts, tables, and analysis.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based documentation skill containing only instructional content for AI-assisted report generation. The SKILL.md file is Markdown documentation that teaches an AI how to structure and generate reports. All 44 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES - the scanner misinterpreted documentation patterns (code fences, hashes, example URLs) as executable code. No actual scripts, network calls, file system access, or external command execution exist in this skill.

content.value_statement: Transform raw data into polished markdown and HTML reports. Create documents with charts, tables, executive summaries, and actionable insights from any dataset.
actual_capabilities: Generate markdown reports with tables, badges, and formatting
Create HTML reports with embedded CSS styling and responsive design
Build data visualizations including bar, line, pie, and scatter charts
Produce executive summaries with key metrics and recommendations
Analyze data patterns, correlations, trends, and anomalies
Export reports to multiple formats with consistent styling
limitations: Cannot directly access external files without user-provided data
Does not include runtime code execution or external tool integration
Chart rendering depends on external libraries and display context
PDF export requires external conversion tools for final output

use_cases.title: Data analysis reports
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive analysis reports with statistical summaries, distributions, and correlation matrices.

use_cases.title: Executive dashboards
use_cases.description: Create high-level summary reports with key metrics, performance indicators, and actionable recommendations.

use_cases.title: Technical documentation
use_cases.description: Build technical reports with code examples, performance benchmarks, and comparison data.

prompt_templates.title: Basic data report
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the report-generator skill to analyze this data and create a markdown report with an executive summary, key metrics, and data quality analysis.

prompt_templates.title: Performance comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a performance comparison report showing baseline versus current metrics with change percentages and status indicators.

prompt_templates.title: HTML visualization
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an HTML report with styled tables, metric cards, and interactive Chart.js visualizations for web display.

prompt_templates.title: Full analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Produce a comprehensive data analysis report including statistical summary, distributions, correlations, and actionable insights.

output_examples.input: Generate a report for this sales data with executive summary and charts.
Create a technical performance report comparing baseline and current metrics.
output: Response time improved by 15% while error rate decreased by 0.5%.

best_practices: Include executive summary at the beginning of long reports for quick insights
Use tables for structured data and charts for trends and distributions
Add timestamps and data sources for traceability and reproducibility
anti_patterns: Avoid overloading reports with too many sections and nested details
Do not skip data quality validation and anomaly detection steps
Avoid inconsistent formatting, styling, and structure across sections

faq.question: What file formats does this skill support?
faq.answer: Works with data passed directly in conversation. Generates markdown, HTML, and PDF outputs. CSV and JSON data can be analyzed directly.

faq.question: What are the size limits for data input?
faq.answer: Performance depends on the host AI model context limits. For large datasets, summarize or sample data before report generation.

faq.question: Can I customize report templates?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill supports custom templates with sections for summary, metrics, analysis, recommendations, and various visualizations.

faq.question: Is my data kept private during processing?
faq.answer: Data processing occurs within your AI session. No data is sent to external services. Review your AI provider's privacy policy.

faq.question: Why are charts not rendering in my output?
faq.answer: Ensure chart data contains labels and values arrays. For HTML reports, Chart.js loads from CDN. Markdown charts require image embedding.

faq.question: How does this skill compare to standalone reporting tools?
faq.answer: Unlike standalone tools, this skill integrates directly into AI conversations for seamless report generation from chat context without switching tools.
